dict.acceptation: 上了年纪的；过了中年的；较老的；

sent.orig: As some of the elderly poor memory, and often forget or repeat medication.
sent.trans: 一些老年人由于记忆力差，常忘记或重复服药。

sent.orig: This elderly Italian guy goes to his parish priest to confess.
sent.trans: 一位年长的意大利男人来向他的神父告解。

sent.orig: Many young people are not willing to look after the elderly.
sent.trans: 许多年轻人不愿意照顾老人。

sent.orig: An elderly, wrapped in a cow's hide, appears and, laughing, to the nunnery high above us.
sent.trans: 一位裹着牛皮年长的牧人出现了，他笑着指着在我们上方远处的尼姑庵。

sent.orig: Constantine had two eligible daughters, Zoe and Theodora, although both were already quite elderly.
sent.trans: 君士坦丁有两个合适的女儿可以继承王位，邹伊和塞奥多拉，尽管她们都年龄非常大了。
